## Usage

```{r lib-ex}
library(kbmemoise)

# current version
packageVersion("kbmemoise")

```

```{r ex-01}
kbc <- cache_kb_self(".cache")

kbc$location()

mrunif <- memoise::memoise(runif, cache = kbc)

mrunif(10) # First run, saves cache
mrunif(10) # Loads cache, results should be identical

kbc$keys()

kbc$size()

kbc$reset()

kbc$size()
```
